name: Viper Mission One
description:
Viper Mission One is my entry for Ludum Dare 48. It is an homage to one of my favorite SciFi series. Take a seat in the cockpit! Your mission is to get as deep as possible into enemy territory.

The rules are simple:

  • Fly as far as you can
  • Destroy your enemies
  • Collect ammo and health containers to survive

The controls are simple too:

  • Use cursor keys, WASD or joystick to steer
  • Space, Ctrl, Shift or joystick buttons to fire

I hope you enjoy this short ride!
